description: [``botocore``] StartTaskContact API now supports linked task creation with a new optional RelatedContactId parameter
[``botocore``] This release adds the ability to delete domains through the DeleteDomain API. For more information see https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cases/latest/APIReference/Welcome.html
[``botocore``] Documentation updates for Redshift API bringing it in line with IAM best practices.
[``botocore``] New Security Hub APIs and updates to existing APIs that help you consolidate control findings and enable and disable controls across all supported standards
